alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 13 at 3:13PM AKST until December 16 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches are possible. Winds gusting to 50 mph are expected * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through late Wednesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 50 mph could cause whiteout conditions in blowing snow starting Tuesday night. Significant drifting of the snow is likely. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
